senses.synonym: 01399178-v (fit closely or tightly; \""The dress hugged her hips\"");01427110-v (hold (someone) tightly in your arms, usually with fondness; \""Hug me, please\""; \""They embraced\""; \""He hugged her close to him\"");00418872-n (a tight or amorous embrace; \""come here and give me a big hug\""

relations.target: embrace=00181619-n (a close affectionate and protective acceptance; \""his willing embrace of new ideas\""; \""in the bosom of the family\"");00418410-n (the act of clasping another person in the arms (as in greeting or affection));14450812-n (the state of taking in or encircling; \""an island in the embrace of the sea\"");00603217-v (take up the cause, ideology, practice, method, of someone and use it as one's own; \""She embraced Catholicism\""; \""They adopted the Jewish faith\"");01427110-v (hold (someone) tightly in your arms, usually with fondness; \""Hug me, please\""; \""They embraced\""; \""He hugged her close to him\"");02635874-v (include in scope; include as part of something broader; have as one's sphere or territory; \""This group encompasses a wide range of people from different backgrounds\""; \""this should cover everyone in the group\""

close=00352791-v (finish a game in baseball by protecting a lead; \""The relief pitcher closed with two runs in the second inning\"");00765876-v (complete a business deal, negotiation, or an agreement; \""We closed on the house on Friday\""; \""They closed the deal on the building\"");01294544-v (unite or bring into contact or bring together the edges of; \""close the circuit\""; \""close a wound\""; \""close a book\""; \""close up an umbrella\"");01347791-v (move so that an opening or passage is obstructed; make shut; \""Close the door\""; \""shut the window\"");01349660-v (become closed; \""The windows closed with a loud bang\"");01425939-v (fill or stop up; \""Can you close the cracks with caulking?\"");01481053-v (bar access to; \""Due to the accident, the road had to be closed for several hours\"");01610192-v (bring together all the elements or parts of; \""Management closed ranks\"");02058306-v (draw near; \""The probe closed with the space station\"");02058465-v (come together, as if in an embrace; \""Her arms closed around her long lost relative\"");02108781-v (change one's body stance so that the forward shoulder and foot are closer to the intended point of impact);02145254-v (cause a window or an application to disappear on a computer desktop);02380710-v (engage at close quarters; \""close with the enemy\"");02430760-v (finish or terminate (meetings, speeches, etc.); \""The meeting was closed with a charge by the chairman of the board\"");02431242-v (cease to operate or cause to cease operating; \""The owners decided to move and to close the factory\""; \""My business closes every night at 8 P.M.\""; \""close up the shop\"");02616663-v (come to a close; \""The concert closed with a nocturne by Chopin\"");02760151-v (be priced or listed when trading stops; \""The stock market closed high this Friday\""; \""My new stocks closed at $59 last night\"");00411619-r (near in time or place or relationship; \""as the wedding day drew near\""; \""stood near the door\""; \""don't shoot until they come near\""; \""getting near to the true explanation\""; \""her mother is always near\""; \""The end draws nigh\""; \""the bullet didn't come close\""; \""don't get too close to the fire\"");00507682-r (in an attentive manner; \""he remained close on his guard\"");00211646-n (the concluding part of any performance);06410044-n (the last section of a communication; \""in conclusion I want to say...\"");15292365-n (the temporal end; the concluding time; \""the stopping point of each round was signaled by a bell\""; \""the market was up at the finish\""; \""they were playing better at the close of the season\"");00022256-a (marked by fidelity to an original; \""a close translation\""; \""a faithful copy of the portrait\""; \""a faithful rendering of the observed facts\"");00310743-a (rigorously attentive; strict and thorough; \""close supervision\""; \""paid close attention\""; \""a close study\""; \""kept a close watch on expenditures\"");00446553-a (not far distant in time or space or degree or circumstances; \""near neighbors\""; \""in the near future\""; \""they are near equals\""; \""his nearest approach to success\""; \""a very near thing\""; \""a near hit by the bomb\""; \""she was near tears\""; \""she was close to tears\""; \""had a close call\"");00448955-a (at or within a short distance in space or time or having elements near each other; \""close to noon\""; \""how close are we to town?\""; \""a close formation of ships\"");00453543-a (close in relevance or relationship; \""a close family\""; \""we are all...in close sympathy with...\""; \""close kin\""; \""a close resemblance\"");00502916-a (inclined to secrecy or reticence about divulging information; \""although they knew her whereabouts her friends kept close about it\"");00560964-a (crowded; \""close quarters\"");00893915-a ((of a contest or contestants) evenly matched; \""a close contest\""; \""a close election\""; \""a tight game\"");01116967-a (giving or spending with reluctance; \""our cheeseparing administration\""; \""very close (or near) with his money\""; \""a penny-pinching miserly old man\"");01439442-a (used of hair or haircuts; \""a close military haircut\"");01450828-a (fitting closely but comfortably; \""a close fit\"");01865308-a (confined to specific persons; \""a close secret\"");02007394-a (strictly confined or guarded; \""kept under close custody\"");02240484-a (of textiles; \""a close weave\""; \""smooth percale with a very tight weave\"");02519542-a (lacking fresh air; \""a dusty airless attic\""; \""the dreadfully close atmosphere\""; \""hot and stuffy and the air was blue with smoke\""
affectionate=01467633-a (having or displaying warmth or affection; \""affectionate children\""; \""a fond embrace\""; \""fond of his nephew\""; \""a tender glance\""
